originalText.text: The best very upfront been knowing her for years.very sweet and kind hearted.I Vanessa get the job done her dress candles are the best work's Everytime highly recommend her to everybody.

originalText.text: Very personable.  Honest and truthful.  Love Vanassa.  Going there over 35 years

text.text: Very personable.  Honest and truthful.  Love Vanassa.  Going there over 35 years

originalText.text:
One of the best shops I've ever been to (and I've been to many)! Not only is Vanessa very caring of her clients, she also cares deeply about the community she's in. She's exceptionally knowledgeable about your spiritual needs and will tailor each solution to the particular situation you may share with her. If your energy is not correct though, try to assess that for yourself before you walk in. She will see right through your nonsense. With that, she's incredibly gifted, warm, and will help you if you are willing to help yourself. Do not mistake her aloofness for something negative; being as gifted as she is takes an enormous amount of spiritual labor, especially with so many people/energies/vibrations entering and exiting the shop all day long. Just be polite and roll with the experience. You won't regret it!

(**Been coming here for 15+ years!)

text.text:

originalText.text:
Spiritual tools, knowledge, and care. The shop owner is knowledgeable and will share her wisdom to help guide you toward your goals. The prices are fair and I find what I need. The energy is always peaceful and positive.

You do need to knock for entry so be patient.
